TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuthenticationMode extends System.Enum

summary.para: FGEecifies the authentication setting used for message exchange.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode AnonymousForCertificate = int32(0)

remarks.para: The certificate of the reFGEonder is available out-of-band to the initiator.

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is anonymous, and that the reFGEonder is authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode AnonymousForSslNegotiated = int32(1)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is anonymous.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode CertificateOverTranFGEort = int32(2)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is authenticated by an X.509 version 3 certificate, and that the reFGEonder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode IssuedToken = int32(3)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator and reFGEonder are authenticated by XML symmetric key tokens.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode IssuedTokenForCertificate = int32(4)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is authenticated by an XML symmetric key token, and that the reFGEonder is authenticated by an X.509 version 3 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode IssuedTokenForSslNegotiated = int32(5)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is authenticated by an XML symmetric key token, and that the reFGEonder is authenticated by the SOAP implementation of SSL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode IssuedTokenOverTranFGEort = int32(6)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is authenticated by an XML symmetric key token, and that the reFGEonder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode Kerberos = int32(7)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator and reFGEonder are authenticated using the Kerberos protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode KerberosOverTranFGEort = int32(8)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is authenticated using the Kerberos protocol, and the reFGEonder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode MutualCertificate = int32(9)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator and reFGEonder are authenticated with X.509 version 3 certificates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode MutualCertificateDuplex = int32(10)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator and reFGEonder are authenticated with X.509 version 3 certificates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode MutualSslNegotiated = int32(11)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator and reFGEonder mutually authenticate each other using X509 version 3 certificates, and the reFGEonder's certificate is available from the SOAP SSL negotiation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode SecureConversation = int32(12)

summary.para: FGEecifies that WS-SecureConversation authentication is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode SFGEiNegotiated = int32(13)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator and reFGEonder obtain a shared security context using the Security Service Provider Interface (SFGEI).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode SFGEiNegotiatedOverTranFGEort = int32(17)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is authenticated by a security context using the Security Service Provider Interface (SFGEI), and the reFGEonder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode UserNameForCertificate = int32(14)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is authenticated using a username token, and the reFGEonder's certificate is available to the initiator out-of-band.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode UserNameForSslNegotiated = int32(15)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is authenticated using a username token, and that the reFGEonder is authenticated by the SOAP implementation of SSL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode UserNameOverTranFGEort = int32(16)

summary.para: FGEecifies that the initiator is authenticated using a username token, and that the reFGEonder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.
